Class PagedSendHandler

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.display.handlers.BaseSendHandler<PagedSendHandler>
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.display.handlers.PagedSendHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SendHandler
public class PagedSendHandler extends BaseSendHandler<PagedSendHandler>
Display content as a list with optional pagination.

      public PagedSendHandler doPaginationInConsole(boolean paginateInConsole)
      Sets whether display output should be paginated if is for console output. This option will be useless if paginate is set to false.
      Parameters:
      paginateInConsole - State of doing pagination in console.
